fields_extracted: BTC/ETH Total Exchange Volume (7DMA), Monthly spot volume, Exchange-specific volumes (Binance/Bybit/Bitget), BTC/ETH/SOL volumes, DEX monthly volume
description: 7-day smoothed trading volume across centralized and decentralized exchanges; measures market liquidity and trading activity trends without daily noise

fields_extracted: BTC/ETH Total Exchange Volume (7DMA), Monthly spot volume, Exchange-specific volumes (Binance/Bybit/Bitget), BTC/ETH/SOL volumes, DEX monthly volume
description: Total dollar value of crypto traded on exchanges; indicates overall market participation and liquidity conditions

fields_extracted: 24-hour trading volume, Historical price data (30 days), Market caps, Total volumes
description: 24-hour trading activity and total market valuation of cryptocurrencies; measures short-term market activity and relative asset sizes

fields_extracted: 24-hour trading volume, Historical price data (30 days), Market caps, Total volumes
description: Historical BTC price and volume over 30 days; shows price trends and how trading activity correlates with price movements

fields_extracted: BTC Price, Futures Volume (24h), Spot Volume (24h), Open Interest, Net Inflow (5min/1h/4h/12h/24h), Volatility (BTC/ETH/SOL/XRP/DOGE), Futures OI (All/CME/Binance), Options Calls/Puts OI, Liquidations (Total/Long/Short/BTC/ETH)
description: Comprehensive BTC derivatives snapshot including open interest (total outstanding futures contracts) and options positioning; reveals institutional sentiment and leverage in the market

fields_extracted: BTC Price, Futures Volume (24h), Spot Volume (24h), Open Interest, Net Inflow (5min/1h/4h/12h/24h), Volatility (BTC/ETH/SOL/XRP/DOGE), Futures OI (All/CME/Binance), Options Calls/Puts OI, Liquidations (Total/Long/Short/BTC/ETH)
description: Net capital movement into/out of spot exchanges over various timeframes; positive inflows suggest accumulation while outflows suggest distribution or self-custody

fields_extracted: BTC Price, Futures Volume (24h), Spot Volume (24h), Open Interest, Net Inflow (5min/1h/4h/12h/24h), Volatility (BTC/ETH/SOL/XRP/DOGE), Futures OI (All/CME/Binance), Options Calls/Puts OI, Liquidations (Total/Long/Short/BTC/ETH)
description: Price volatility (standard deviation of returns) for major cryptocurrencies; measures market uncertainty and risk levels

fields_extracted: BTC Price, Futures Volume (24h), Spot Volume (24h), Open Interest, Net Inflow (5min/1h/4h/12h/24h), Volatility (BTC/ETH/SOL/XRP/DOGE), Futures OI (All/CME/Binance), Options Calls/Puts OI, Liquidations (Total/Long/Short/BTC/ETH)
description: Derivatives market structure showing futures/options positioning; high open interest indicates strong conviction while options skew shows directional bias

fields_extracted: BTC Price, Futures Volume (24h), Spot Volume (24h), Open Interest, Net Inflow (5min/1h/4h/12h/24h), Volatility (BTC/ETH/SOL/XRP/DOGE), Futures OI (All/CME/Binance), Options Calls/Puts OI, Liquidations (Total/Long/Short/BTC/ETH)
description: Forced closures of leveraged positions when margin requirements aren't met; high liquidations indicate overleveraged market and can cause cascading price moves

fields_extracted: Daily exchange volume (historical), Volume and price data
description: Historical daily trading volume across exchanges; useful for backtesting and analyzing past market conditions

fields_extracted: Total ETH Deposited, Total Validators, Distinct Depositor Addresses
description: Total ETH locked in proof-of-stake consensus; indicates network security commitment and reduces circulating supply

fields_extracted: Total ETH Deposited, Total Validators, Distinct Depositor Addresses
description: Number of validators and unique depositors in ETH staking; measures network decentralization and breadth of participation

fields_extracted: Total ETH Deposited, Total Validators, Distinct Depositor Addresses
description: Combined ETH staking health metrics; reflects confidence in Ethereum's long-term value and yield-seeking behavior

fields_extracted: Date, Value, Series ID, Series Name, Realtime Start/End
description: Survey-based index of consumer optimism about current and future economic conditions; leading indicator that predicts consumer spending

fields_extracted: Date, Value, Series ID, Series Name, Realtime Start/End
description: Market-implied average inflation rate over next 10 years (difference between nominal Treasury and TIPS yields); reflects investor inflation expectations

fields_extracted: Date, Value, Series ID, Series Name, Realtime Start/End
description: University of Michigan survey measuring household views on personal finances and business conditions; precedes changes in consumer spending patterns

fields_extracted: Date, Value, Series ID, Series Name, Realtime Start/End
description: Expected inflation rate starting 5 years from now for the following 5 years; measures long-term inflation anchoring and Fed credibility

fields_extracted: Date, Value, Series ID, Series Name, Realtime Start/End
description: OECD composite leading indicator designed to predict economic turning points; values above 100 indicate expansion and below 100 indicate contraction

fields_extracted: Date, Value, Series ID, Series Name, Realtime Start/End
description: Cleveland Fed model combining market prices and survey data to estimate 1-year inflation expectations; near-term inflation outlook

fields_extracted: Date, Value, Series ID, Series Name, Realtime Start/End
description: Cleveland Fed model estimate of 10-year inflation expectations; measures whether long-term inflation expectations remain anchored near Fed's 2% target

fields_extracted: Index of Consumer Sentiment (ICS_ALL), Current Economic Conditions (ICC), Consumer Expectations (ICE), Year Ahead Inflation (PX_MD), Long Run Inflation (PX5_MD)
description: Monthly survey of consumer attitudes separating current conditions from future expectations plus inflation outlook; key input for forecasting consumer behavior

fields_extracted: Economic Sentiment Indicator (EU/EA), Employment Expectations Indicator (EU/EA), Flash Consumer Confidence (EA)
description: European Commission surveys tracking business and consumer confidence across EU; leading indicators for European economic activity

fields_extracted: Symbol, Name, Market Capitalization, Sector, Industry, 52-week High
description: Fundamental company data including size (market cap) and classification; basic building blocks for stock analysis and screening

fields_extracted: Symbol, Name, Market Capitalization, Sector, Industry, 52-week High
description: Largest publicly traded companies by market capitalization; represents blue-chip stocks that drive major index performance

fields_extracted: Symbol, Name, Grade, % Change, Weighting, Holdings
description: ETFs with exposure to dental/healthcare sector including technical trading grades; sector-specific investment vehicles for thematic investing

fields_extracted: Symbol, Name, % Assets, Shares
description: Individual stock holdings within dental sector ETFs; shows actual company exposure and concentration risk

fields_extracted: Ticker, Company, Market Cap, Country
description: Companies classified under SIC code 3843 (dental equipment); pure-play dental industry stocks for sector analysis

fields_extracted: Ticker, Expected Return, Sharpe Ratio, Beta, Volatility, P/E, Dividend Yield
description: Risk-adjusted performance metrics for dental stocks; Sharpe ratio measures return per unit of risk while beta shows market sensitivity
